text: This is a list of islands of Kuwait. Kuwait has nine Islands (ten including one former island). They are indicated on the NASA satellite image and listed in the table in order from north to south: {| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" |-style="background: #CCC;" |colspan="9" align="center" | Islands of Kuwait |- |colspan="9" align="center" | NASA Visible Color Satellite Image with islands of Kuwait |- ! align ="left"|Island ||Arabic|| align="right"| Area km² || Coordinates |- | colspan=9 align=center bgcolor="#EFEFEF" | northern mudflat islands (Al Jahra Governorate) |- | Warbah Island || align="right"| جَزِيرَة وَرْبَة|| align="right"| 37 || |- | Bubiyan Island || align="right"| جَزِيرَة بُوبِيَان|| align="right"| 863 || |- | colspan=9 align=center bgcolor="#EFEFEF" | Failaka with satellite islands (Al Asimah Governorate) |- | Miskan Island ||align="right"| جَزِيرَة مِسْكَان || align="right"| 0.75 || |- | Failaka Island || align="right"| جَزِيرَة فَيْلَكَا|| align="right"| 20 || |- | Auhah Island || align="right"| جَزِيرَة عَوْهَة|| align="right"| 0.35 || |- | colspan=9 align=center bgcolor="#EFEFEF" | islands of Kuwait Bay (Al Asimah Governorate) |- | Umm an Namil Island || align="right"| جَزِيرَة أُمّ اَلنَّمْل|| align="right"| 0.569 || |- | Shuwaikh Island1) || align="right"| جَزِيرَة قُرَيْن|| align="right"| 0.012 || |- | colspan=9 align=center bgcolor="#EFEFEF" | southern islands (Al Ahmadi Governorate) |- | Kubbar Island || align="right"| جَزِيرَة كُبَّر|| align="right"| 0.11 || |- | Qaruh Island ||align="right"| جَزِيرَة قَارُوه || align="right"| 0.035 || |- | Umm al Maradim Island || align="right"| جَزِيرَة أُمّ اَلْمَرَادِم || align="right"| 0.165 || |-style="background: #DDD;" |Islands of Kuwait|| || align="right"| 922 || |- |colspan=9 align=left bgcolor="#ffffff" |1) former island |} ==See also== *Geography of Kuwait *List of islands ==External links== *map of maritime boundaries * Kuwait Islands
title: List of islands of Kuwait
